topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521f8ce636872592bc80000#post_5521f8ce636872592bc80000
Yes actually.

The way you do this is lots and lots and lots of positive reinforcement.

If you want to get into it here's my advice:
A)consensual
B)they're aware what you're doing
C)they are willing to let themselves be brainwashed in that manner
D)lots of positive reinforcement
E)don't do it without consent
F)don't do it to change their political or religious beliefs
G)don't make them emotionally dependant on you
H)don't be a dick about it
I)if you want to change their personality only do it in ways they are comfortable with and when doing so reinforce it in a positive manner
J)don't do negative reinforcement cause that's the dick way
